Blogs/Drakon's-Chamberpot/Meet-Me-at-My-.title: Meet Me at My Room~
Blogs/Drakon's-Chamberpot/Meet-Me-at-My-.content:
Drakon‚Äôs Chamberpot - Posts

  



  You receive a new message:
  "Hey, come over to my room for some fun~ üíúüí¶"
  
    It's from Vallia! There's more messages with attachments incoming...
  


  üü£Full resolution on MEGA.



Vallia sends you a selfie, she‚Äôs standing in her bedroom wearing some cute lingerie.

  


Another selfie! Except‚Ä¶her lingerie‚Äôs revealing; her immense erection is on full display.

  


An extra follow up render.
I got lazy and didn‚Äôt bother with a background.

  



Some random lewd selfie style renders featuring my original character Vallia from my Baldur‚Äôs Gate 3 alternative universe. I introduced her briefly recently in this post. I‚Äôm hoping to better flesh out my characters and renders here on my blog here in future posts, but for now here‚Äôs some minimal context. I‚Äôve also become notoriously bad at writing and giving context lately, Twitter has rotted my brain with it‚Äôs low character limits and lack of attention span. Time to practice my writing! Anyway, expect to see more immersion breaking renders featuring Tiefling Vallia. Baldur‚Äôs Gate 3 is probably gonna grip my creative brain for a bit.

Recipes/Black-Bean-Burger-Binder.title: Black Bean Burger Binder
Recipes/Black-Bean-Burger-Binder.content:
üßÇ Black Bean Burger Binder
Use tortilla chip crumbs as a binder in black bean burgers. Adds crunch, salt, and a subtle corn flavor. Works well with cumin, garlic, and onion powder.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Breakfast-Burrito-Filler.title: Breakfast Burrito Filler
Recipes/Breakfast-Burrito-Filler.content:
Breakfast Burrito Filler
Mix chip crumbs with eggs, beans, and cheese inside a tortilla for a crunchy breakfast burrito. Adds flavor and structure.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Casserole-Topping.title: Casserole Topping
Recipes/Casserole-Topping.content:
üßÇ Casserole Topping
Use chip crumbs as a crunchy topping for casseroles‚Äîenchilada bake, mac & cheese, or veggie layers. Mix with shredded cheese or a bit of butter for extra crisp.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Cheese-Log-Crust.title: Cheese Log Crust
Recipes/Cheese-Log-Crust.content:
üßÄ Cheese Log Crust
Roll a soft cheese log (like goat cheese or cream cheese blend) in tortilla chip crumbs. Adds crunch and flavor. Serve with crackers or veggies.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Cheesy-Chip-Balls.title: Cheesy Chip Balls
Recipes/Cheesy-Chip-Balls.content:
Cheesy Chip Balls
Combine chip crumbs with cream cheese, shredded cheddar, and spices. Roll into bite-sized balls and coat with more crumbs for a crunchy exterior.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Chili-Base-Layer.title: Chili Base Layer
Recipes/Chili-Base-Layer.content:
üßÇ Chili Base Layer
Sprinkle chip crumbs at the bottom of your bowl before adding chili. They soak up flavor and add texture as you eat. Great with vegetarian or beef chili.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Chip-Butter-Spread.title: Chip Butter Spread
Recipes/Chip-Butter-Spread.content:
Chip Butter Spread
Blend chip crumbs into softened butter with lime zest and smoked paprika. Spread on toast, grilled corn, or roasted veggies.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Chip-Crusted-Avocado-Fries.title: Chip-Crusted Avocado Fries
Recipes/Chip-Crusted-Avocado-Fries.content:
Chip-Crusted Avocado Fries
Coat avocado slices in chip crumbs and bake or air fry. Serve with salsa, sour cream, or chipotle mayo.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Crumb-Coated-Quesadillas.title: Crumb-Coated Quesadillas
Recipes/Crumb-Coated-Quesadillas.content:
Crumb-Coated Quesadillas
Press chip crumbs into the outside of a quesadilla before grilling. Adds a crispy, golden shell with extra flavor.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Crumb-Crusted-Elote-Bake.title: Crumb-Crusted Elote Bake
Recipes/Crumb-Crusted-Elote-Bake.content:
Crumb-Crusted Elote Bake
Layer roasted corn, crema, lime juice, and chip crumbs in a baking dish. Bake until bubbly and golden for a street-corn-inspired side.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Crust-for-Chicken-or-Fish.title: Crust for Chicken or Fish
Recipes/Crust-for-Chicken-or-Fish.content:
Crust for Chicken or Fish
Crush tortilla chips finely and use as a coating for fried or baked chicken tenders, fish fillets, or tofu. A flavorful alternative to breadcrumbs or panko.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Egg-Scramble-Crunch.title: Egg Scramble Crunch
Recipes/Egg-Scramble-Crunch.content:
Egg Scramble Crunch
Toss chip crumbs into scrambled eggs or omelets for a salty kick and added texture. Great with jalape√±os or salsa.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Falafel-Remix.title: Falafel Remix
Recipes/Falafel-Remix.content:
Falafel Remix
Blend tortilla chip crumbs into chickpea patties with jalape√±o, lime, and cilantro. Pan-fry for a Tex-Mex twist on falafel.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/How-to-Check-for-Rancid-Chips.filePath: Recipes/How to Check for Rancid Chips.md
Recipes/How-to-Check-for-Rancid-Chips.title: How to Check for Rancid Chips
Recipes/How-to-Check-for-Rancid-Chips.content:
üß™ How to Check for Rancid Chips
Rancid chips are not just stale‚Äîthey‚Äôve undergone fat oxidation and may be unsafe to eat. Here‚Äôs how to identify them.
üîç Signs of Rancidity
Smell Test

Sour, musty, or chemical-like odor
May resemble old paint, crayons, or varnish

Taste Test

Bitter, metallic, or soapy flavor
Even a small bite can reveal off-flavors‚Äîspit it out if it tastes wrong

Visual Signs

Oil leakage inside the bag
Discoloration or dark patches on chips

Texture Clues

Chips may feel rubbery, overly oily, or sticky

‚ö†Ô∏è Why Rancid Chips Are Unsafe

Can cause nausea, stomach discomfort, or vomiting
Oxidized fats may contribute to inflammation or cellular damage over time

‚úÖ Storage Tips to Prevent Rancidity

Store in a cool, dry, dark place
Use airtight containers after opening
Avoid heat, humidity, and direct sunlight

Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Huevos-Chip-ercheros.title: Huevos Chip-ercheros
Recipes/Huevos-Chip-ercheros.content:
Huevos Chip-ercheros
Layer chip crumbs under poached eggs with salsa verde and crema. A crunchy remix of huevos rancheros.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Ice-Cream-Crunch-Topping.title: Ice Cream Crunch Topping
Recipes/Ice-Cream-Crunch-Topping.content:
Ice Cream Crunch Topping
Toast chip crumbs with cinnamon sugar and sprinkle over vanilla or dulce de leche ice cream. Sweet meets salty.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Meatball-or-Meatloaf-Filler.title: Meatball or Meatloaf Filler
Recipes/Meatball-or-Meatloaf-Filler.content:
üßÇ Meatball or Meatloaf Filler
Swap breadcrumbs for tortilla chip crumbs in meatballs or meatloaf. Adds a Tex-Mex twist and helps hold moisture. Try with ground beef, pork, or turkey.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Mexican-Chocolate-Bark.title: Mexican Chocolate Bark
Recipes/Mexican-Chocolate-Bark.content:
Mexican Chocolate Bark
Mix chip crumbs into melted dark chocolate with cinnamon and chili flakes. Spread thin and break into shards.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Mexican-Migas-Substitute.title: Mexican Migas Substitute
Recipes/Mexican-Migas-Substitute.content:
üç≥ Mexican Migas Substitute
Substitute tortilla chip crumbs for fried tortilla strips in migas. Stir into scrambled eggs with onions, peppers, and cheese. Quick and satisfying.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Mexican-Pesto.title: Mexican Pesto
Recipes/Mexican-Pesto.content:
Mexican Pesto
Blend chip crumbs with cilantro, garlic, lime juice, and olive oil for a chip-inspired pesto. Use on tacos, grilled veggies, or sandwiches.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Nacho-Dust-Popcorn.title: Nacho Dust Popcorn
Recipes/Nacho-Dust-Popcorn.content:
Nacho Dust Popcorn
Mix chip crumbs with melted butter and toss with popcorn for a nacho-flavored snack. Add a pinch of chili powder for extra kick.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Queso-Dip-Thickener.title: Queso Dip Thickener
Recipes/Queso-Dip-Thickener.content:
Queso Dip Thickener
Stir chip crumbs into warm queso to thicken and add crunch. Perfect for dipping or spooning over nachos.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Savory-Crumble-Topping.content:
Savory Crumble Topping
Use chip crumbs in place of breadcrumbs in savory pies or gratins. Adds bold flavor and crunch.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Savory-Pancake-Topping.title: Savory Pancake Topping
Recipes/Savory-Pancake-Topping.content:
Savory Pancake Topping
Top cornmeal pancakes with chip crumbs, shredded cheddar, and hot sauce. A bold brunch twist.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Soup-Garnish.title: Soup Garnish
Recipes/Soup-Garnish.content:
Soup Garnish
Top chili, tortilla soup, or black bean soup with chip crumbs for a satisfying crunch and extra flavor.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Spicy-Chip-Brittle.title: Spicy Chip Brittle
Recipes/Spicy-Chip-Brittle.content:
Spicy Chip Brittle
Make caramel brittle with chip crumbs, cayenne, and pepitas. Sweet, spicy, and unexpectedly addictive.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Stuffed-Peppers-or-Mushrooms.title: Stuffed Peppers or Mushrooms
Recipes/Stuffed-Peppers-or-Mushrooms.content:
Stuffed Peppers or Mushrooms
Mix chip crumbs into the stuffing for peppers or mushrooms to add flavor and texture. Works well with cheese and beans.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Taco-Pizza-Crust.title: Taco Pizza Crust
Recipes/Taco-Pizza-Crust.content:
üßÄ Taco Pizza Crust
Use chip crumbs as part of a taco-style pizza base or sprinkle on top. Combine with refried beans, salsa, and cheese. Bake until golden.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Taco-Salad-Crunch.title: Taco Salad Crunch
Recipes/Taco-Salad-Crunch.content:
Taco Salad Crunch
Sprinkle chip crumbs over taco salads or burrito bowls for added texture and flavor. Great for repurposing the bottom-of-the-bag bits.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Tex-Mex-Breadcrumbs.title: Tex-Mex Breadcrumbs
Recipes/Tex-Mex-Breadcrumbs.content:
Tex-Mex Breadcrumbs
Use tortilla chip crumbs as a crunchy topping for casseroles, mac and cheese, or baked pasta. Adds a salty, zesty twist.

Recipes/Tortilla-Chip-Quiche-Crust.title: Tortilla Chip Quiche Crust
Recipes/Tortilla-Chip-Quiche-Crust.content:
Tortilla Chip Quiche Crust
Use tortilla chip crumbs as a savory crust base for quiche. Mix with a little oil and egg to bind, then press into a pie dish. Perfect with chorizo, roasted peppers, or cotija.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs

Recipes/Trail-Mix-Crunch.title: Trail Mix Crunch
Recipes/Trail-Mix-Crunch.content:
Trail Mix Crunch
Mix chip crumbs with roasted nuts, pepitas, and dried chili mango. A spicy-salty upgrade to your usual trail mix.
Tortilla Chip Crumbs
